snippet: Witnesses described a scene of uncertainty during the shooting at Los Angeles International Airport, where a T.S.A. officer was killed, at least one terminal was evacuated, flights were grounded and several people were sent to the hospital with...
abstract: Witnesses described a scene of uncertainty during the shooting at Los Angeles International Airport, where a T.S.A. officer was killed, at least one terminal was evacuated, flights were grounded and several people were sent to the hospital with injuries.

headline.main: Descriptions of Chaos and Fear at Los Angeles Airport Shooting
